briefTitle: Drug Exposure and Depot Medroxyprogesterone Acetate (DMPA) in Adolescent Subjects
officialTitle: Relationship Between Drug Exposure and DNA Markers With Depot Medroxyprogesterone Acetate-associated Side Effects in Adolescents
conditions: Disorder of Bone Density and Structure, Unspecified

interventions.name: Depot medroxyprogesterone acetate (DMPA)
otherNames: Generic Depo Provera manufactured by Greenstone, LLC

summary: The investigators are doing this study to look at how different doses of the Depot medroxyprogesterone acetate (DMPA) shot effect weight gain and bone mineral density in teens. The investigators hope that what the investigators learn from this study will be used to develop ways to keep girls from gaining weight or losing bone density when receiving DMPA.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change in Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density (BMD) From Baseline to 48 Weeks
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Percent change from baseline to 48 Weeks
